valueMarkdown.value: This value set is deprecated in AU Base and replaced by the NCTS [Medication Ingredient](https://healthterminologies.gov.au/fhir/ValueSet/medication-ingredient-1) value set for binding to Medication.ingredient.item[x] in the [AU Base Medication](https://hl7.org.au/fhir/6.0.0/StructureDefinition-au-medication.html) profile.

description.value: The AMT Medicinal Product and Substances value set includes values that may be used to identify a substance or a medicinal product that is an ingredient of a medication.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
